The Manual of Cross Breeding

miscellaneous (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 394
horrormark chance [taint]: 5%
(crossbreeding-bonus [crossbreeder])

Requires 15B15N to forge (B3N3)

This tome contains the results of cross breeding between all kind of different species using various techniques. It is an immense help when performing experimental cross breeding and will increase the amount of surviving subjects, as well as increasing the chance of breeding something powerful.
